law.catch_line: Referendum on area or statewide basis -- Participation eligibility.
law.text: Any referendum conducted under the provisions of KRS 247.610 to 247.685 may be held either on an area or statewide basis, as may be determined by such duly certified association before such referendum is called; and such referendum, on an area or statewide basis, may be participated in by all bovine cattle producers, including owners of farms on which such bovine cattle are produced and tenants sharing in the proceeds of bovine cattle. In the referendum, individuals so eligible for participation shall vote upon the question of whether or not there shall be levied an assessment in the amount set forth in the call for the referendum.
